0005000010143600.name: Zelda Wind Waker HD
0005000010143600.comment:
Seems to run okay, at around 20-25 FPS in-game on my M1 MacBook Air. Only tested the first 5 minutes of the game but it seems very promising.
Source: @emiyl
0005000010143600.author: emiyl

0005000010101d00.name: New Super Mario Bros U
0005000010101d00.comment:

Source: Andrew Tsai
0005000010101d00.author: emiyl
